jhelp.util.thread

Class ThreadActor

  • java.lang.Object
    • jhelp.util.thread.ThreadActor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    final class ThreadActor
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    Thread that do a threaded task ThreadedTask, ThreadedSimpleTask or ThreadedVerySimpleTask, then wait for an other one to do
    Author:
    JHelp

        Parameters:
        threadElement - Task to do
        Returns:
        true if the settings have done. false if the settings not do because the thread already on doing a task
